metadescription.caption: Description
metadescription.help: Used as the meta description value.

metakeywords.caption: Keywords
metakeywords.help: Used as the meta keywords value.

metatitle.caption: Title
metatitle.help: Used as the value of the <title> tag.

alttext.caption: Alternate Text
alttext.help: Text to help describe media to users that cannot see it.
